name: Ancient Earth Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., fly 40 ft., burrow 60 ft.
description: The Ancient Earth Dragon embodies primal forces of earth and stone with its massive form and rocky exterior. It has large, powerful limbs and a fearsome presence that commands respect.
memorable: Its ability to blend seamlessly with rocky terrain while motionless and its capacity to alter the battlefield make it a unique and strategic threat.
goals: The dragon seeks to protect its essence-linked area and may lay ambushes for intruders.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other powerful earth-based creatures or serve as a protector of natural landmarks.
environment: Typically found in mountainous regions, caverns, or areas rich in earth and stone.
strengths: With exceptional physical and magical strength, it can manipulate terrain and has strong resistance against non-magical attacks.
weaknesses: Its reliance on a specific landmark for resting can be a strategic vulnerability for those who know it.
attacks: The dragon employs a powerful Multiattack strategy, using a combination of a bite and slam attacks or a Rock Spire attack to control combat.
most_powerful_ability: The Scouring Breath, which unleashes a devastating cone of slashing damage, emphasizing its area control.
senses: With darkvision and tremorsense extending to 120 feet, it has exceptional awareness of its surroundings.
skills: The dragon excels in Athletics, Insight, Nature, and Perception, showcasing its dominance in both physical and mental challenges.
additional_information: Earth Glide allows it to burrow without leaving a trace.
False Appearance makes it indistinguishable from the rocky terrain when still.
Legendary Resistance enables it to succeed on failed saving throws three times per day.
Essence Link ties its wellbeing to a specific landmark.
Innate spellcasting capability with spells related to terrain manipulation and surveillance.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting uses Charisma, allowing it to cast spells that manipulate terrain and control the battlefield.
test_queries: massive dragon of earth and stone
